name: One Night In Pyongyang
description:
Simple project started for GMTK 2021.  

You play as an unnamed female autocrat of a Democratic People's nation as she tries to snipe valid relationship partners from a crowd of parade goers.

The theme of "Joined Together" came up from the forced hardship of an arranged marriage, but there's also a visual snake to mimic a "human centipede" joke suggestion from my discord.
